FAV_1.label: About Favorite Commands
FAV_1.code:
% Display help documentation for Favorite Commands
helpview(fullfile(docroot, 'matlab', 'helptargets.map'), 'matlab_favorites');

FAV_2.label: Clear Variables & Commands

FAV_3.label: Go to User Folder
FAV_3.code:
% Change MATLAB current folder to the first folder on the search path
cd(userpath);
